about_the_game:
Embark on a frenetic journey through an adrenaline-fueled, where every moment is a whirlwind of flying bullets and split-second decisions. In this Bullet Heaven, rogue-lite on wheels with RPG elements, each new adventure brings unique and thrilling challenges. Explore vast and perilous landscapes, choosing your gear to take on relentless enemies and formidable bosses. Brace yourself for intense action and constant thrill .

  • CARS: Gear up, speed ahead, smash through, and drift to leave your enemies in the dust!

  • MULTIPLAYER: Team up with up to 4 heroes to explore, conquer, and dominate together. Forge bonds and take down the toughest foes as a squad!

  • UPGRADES: Boost your power with better gear, legendary equipment, and upgrades that make you unstoppable.


  • EQUIPMENTS: Discover a vast arsenal of weapons and equipment, each with unique mechanics to master and customize your playstyle!


  • UNLOCKABLES: Unlock powerful new gear, exclusive buffs, and unique characters as you progress.


  • REPLAYABILITY: Dive back in, growing stronger each time with a rewarding meta-game.

  • DUNGEONS: Find hidden dungeons, face waves of enemies, and claim valuable rewards.

  • QUESTS:Stumble upon random quests during your adventure for extra loot and surprises!

Don’t miss out—wishlist now to join the ultimate ride!
